name: Heidi: The Game
overview: Heidi: The Game is a side scrolling platform game based on the 2005 movie Heidi. In the game, the player controls the girl Heidi and has to run and jump platforms to reach the end of the level. The player start with three lives witch diminish by taking damage from forest creatures like a fox, hedgehog or bird. The player can also collect flowers, 100 flowers earns an extra live.
